'''Pine-Backed Tea Chair''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Pine-Backed Tea Chair is obtainable from Adeptal Mirror.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
